sourcesContent:
function Layout() { return(

☰

Lotion

Like Notion, but worse

Notes

+

{noNotesMessage} {notes.map((note) => (
setActiveNote(note.id)} key={note.id} >
{note.title}
{new Date(note.dateCreated).toLocaleDateString("en-US", { month: "long", day: "numeric", year: "numeric", hour: "numeric", minute: "numeric", hour12: true, })}

{note.body && note.body.substr(0, 20) + "..."}

))}
) } export default Layout;
